ISSUE.TITLE: Add `tar` to the DSE images
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When troubleshooting misbehaving pods it's often required to be able to extract a large number of files from the container outside of it. `tar` is very handy to perform such operations and is present in the Cassandra images but not the DSE ones. We'd need to add `tar` to the DSE images as well. It is also mandatory to be able to use `kubectl cp` commands. ```[tasklist] ### Definition of Done - [ ] `tar` is added to the dse images ```
